entry.title: moznion/Acme--AjiFry
entry.summary:
Acme::AjiFry is the AjiFry Language (アジフライ語) Translater.

NAME

Acme::AjiFry - AjiFry Language (アジフライ語) Translator

VERSION

This document describes Acme::AjiFry version 0.09

SYNOPSIS

use Acme::AjiFry;

my $ajifry = Acme::AjiFry->new();

print $ajifry->to_AjiFry('おさしみ')."\n"; # outputs => "食えアジフライお刺身食え食えお刺身ドボドボ岡星ドボドボ"
print $ajifry->to_Japanese('食えアジフライお刺身食え食えお刺身ドボドボ岡星ドボドボ')."\n"; # outputs => "おさしみ"

DESCRIPTION

Acme::AjiFry is the AjiFry-Language translator. This module can translate Japanese into AjiFry-Language, and vice versa. If you would like to know about AjiFry-Language, please refer to the following web site (Japanese Web Site). http://ja.uncyclopedia.info/wiki/%E3%82%A2%E3%82%B8%E3%83%95%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E8%AA%9E

METHODS

  • new

    new is the constructor of this module.

  • to_Japanese

    This function needs a AjiFry-Language string as parameter. It returns Japanese which was translated from AjiFry-Language.

  • to_AjiFry

    This function needs a string as parameter. It returns AjiFry-Language which was translated from Japanese.

DEPENDENCIES

  • Encode (version 2.39 or later)

BUGS AND LIMITATIONS

No bugs have been reported.

Please report any bugs or feature requests to bug-acme-ajifry@rt.cpan.org, or through the web interface at http://rt.cpan.org.

AUTHOR

moznion <moznion[at]gmail.com>
